title: CapCut Video / Reel Editing & Content Culling Support
description:
*PLEASE DO NOT APPLY IF YOU DO NOT HAVE EXPERIENCE WORKING WITH BEAUTY BRANDS / TREATMENTS*



Requirements of Application:

- Must be able to provide examples of beauty industry work, if work is unable to be provided, minimum of 2 years experience is essential.

- This role is for part time hours, and may increase to a full time opportunity for the right candidate.

- More than 1 role available depending on your editing strengths.

- Please provide a portfolio of your video editing skills, those with interview style & beauty / event experienced editors will be highly favoured.



Important Note:

I will require a contract to be signed that includes a non-disclosure clause:

You agree not to share or use any of the content in your portfolio or elsewhere.



If the below skills sound like strengths of yours I would love to hear from you!



------------------------



I am looking for ongoing support with editing tasks, and would like to secure weekly hours with the right candidate



You will be able to demonstrate:

- Strong attention to detail

- Story telling abilities

- Ability to identify the best parts of raw content/videos (whether that be in terms of strong emotion, or highest quality of details), with regards to culling support.

- Ability to conceptualise / come up with ideas without need for instruction



The tasks I am looking for support on include:



1. Face to Camera Content Edits (on CapCut)

These are short talking videos where I or clients speak to the camera.



I would need you to:



- Edit the transcript

- Cut out pauses, filler words (like "um", "ahh")

- Add transitions and sound effects when needed

- Add overlays - where it makes sense to reflect an overlay, not placed at random (I will film and provide these)

Overlay skill is key for identifying and noticing vocal ques, while also not transitioning them off the screen too fast where the viewer is unable to process what the overlay truly showed ie. if it is a beauty before and after the viewer must be able to process the work, not be overstimulated.





Examples of my past editing / clients:



- Basic talking: 
/p/DKJnY4wyBSz/



- Captions, overlays + sound effects:


/p/DSW667aEx9c/


/p/DJGuCopz4wM/


/p/DH5RBCJh1gF/



-Story telling abilities, identifying opportunity out of raw content:


/p/DQ3hwjZEeIs/



-Story telling abilities


/p/DUFmgK6D6Dt/


/p/DOstvymkcdM/





--------------



Beauty Service Content (Culling Only Support, for me to self edit OR, completed Edits of this style if capabilities align)

This is content I film of my clients getting treatments like brow lamination, lash lift, or cosmetic tattooing.



Culling support looks like:



- Scan through all the footage, cutting each clip down to approx 0.8 seconds.

Cut out and save the best clips - focus on close-ups, clean shots, good angles & lighting, + a variation of distance + close up clips.



- Don’t reorder anything - just delete the unnecessary parts



- Upload the culled version back to CapCut Space - I will complete the final editing

- For the right candidate I am looking for support to complete the entire edit in time / with training where necessary*



Examples of my past editing / clients:



- 

- 

- 



--------------



Event Content (Same structure as the above applies).

I film birthdays, weddings, and beauty training sessions. The raw videos once imported to CapCut can start between 30 - 200 minutes worth of raw footage to cut down.



For these, I would need you to:



- Scan through all the footage, cutting each clip down to approx 0.8-1.5 seconds.



- Identify and keep the best and most emotional clips (smiles, laughs, tears, reactions, etc.), plus the best footage of the overall event (the decor, and everything) - Delete any extra content (that is less favourable, bad lighting etc.)



- No reordering needed - I will finish the edit

HOWEVER, am ideally looking for a strong video editor to complete these edits in full.



Examples of my past editing / clients:



- Student training: 



- Wedding: 



- Birthday: 
/p/DFFIL1Ly_8g/



----------



If this sounds like skills you hold, please reach out - I would love to hear from you & can't wait to work together.

title: SOCIAL MEDIA & YOUTUBE MARKETING MANAGER (REAL ESTATE)
description:
ABOUT THE ROLE



We are a real estate team based in British Columbia, Canada with 20+ years of experience.



Our goal is to grow a strong personal brand on:



- Instagram

- YouTube

-

- TikTok



We want content that builds trust, grows followers, and generates real leads — not just likes.



This is not a posting job.



We need someone who understands how content grows and can turn real estate knowledge into engaging videos and social media content.



---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

YOUR MAIN ROLE



Plan, manage, and grow our social media presence across:



- Instagram (Reels, Carousels, Stories)

- YouTube (Long-form + Shorts)

-
 (Reels + Page content)

- TikTok

- Google My Business



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

DAY-TO-DAY TASKS



- Plan weekly content ideas

- Write hooks, captions, titles, and video outlines

- Turn long videos into short clips (Reels, Shorts, TikTok)

- Optimize titles, thumbnails, and descriptions

- Track performance and improve content weekly

- Suggest new content ideas and formats

- Help position the brand as a trusted real estate expert



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PLATFORM KNOWLEDGE REQUIRED



- Instagram

    - Reels growth, engagement, shares, saves

    - Turning views into followers

- YouTube

    -Titles, thumbnails, retention

    - Long-form + Shorts strategy

    - Basic analytics (CTR, watch time)

-

    - Repurposing content

    - Local reach and engagement

- TikTok

    - Hooks, trends, discovery content

    - Turning expertise into short videos

-Google My Business

     - Posting updates

     - Uploading photos/videos

     - Managing info and insights



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WHAT WE ARE NOT LOOKING FOR



- Someone who only schedules posts

- Someone who relies only on hashtags

- Someone who copies trends without strategy

- Someone managing too many unrelated clients

- Someone who cannot explain why content works



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SKILLS & EXPERIENCE



- Experience growing social media accounts

- Strong understanding of video content (short + long)

- Creative and strategic thinking

- Comfortable working with an on-camera professional

- Able to read analytics and improve results

- Real estate experience is a plus, but not required.



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

TOOLS



- Instagram, YouTube Studio,

- CapCut or similar editing tools

- Basic analytics tools

- Google Docs / Sheets / Notion



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HOW SUCCESS IS MEASURED



- More reach and engagement

- Growth in followers and subscribers

- Better watch time and retention

- More DMs and inquiries

- Strong, consistent brand presence



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO APPLY



Please include:



- Links to social media accounts you helped grow

- Short explanation: how would you grow a real estate personal brand?

- One video or post you worked on that performed well and why



Applications without examples will not be considered.

title: Part Time Digital Artist Graphic Designer for Custom Wood Products
description:
We are Welsh Woodworking & Design, a custom woodworking brand based in Canada. We create high end, handcrafted charcuterie boards that feature unique custom artwork which is printed and embedded directly into the wood.



We are looking for a creative Digital Artist Graphic Designer to help design custom artwork for client orders. This includes names, logos, sports themes, symbols, line art, and clean modern designs that translate well when printed into wood.



This is a long term, part time position with consistent creative work.



Responsibilities



• Create custom digital artwork based on client requests

• Design clean, high contrast artwork suitable for printing into wood

• Make small revisions based on feedback

• Deliver final files in print ready formats

• Help brainstorm new design ideas when needed



Requirements



• Strong skills in Adobe Illustrator and or Photoshop

• Experience with logos, typography, line art, or illustration

• Ability to follow creative direction and meet deadlines

• Good communication and attention to detail



Bonus experience but not required

• Designing for physical products or print

• Sports themed or personalized designs



Hours and Pay



• Part time role with approximately 10 to 20 hours per week

• Pay range is 5 to 8 USD per hour depending on experience

• Opportunity for more hours and higher pay as the business grows



Why Work With Us



• Long term position with consistent work

• Friendly and respectful communication

• Creative work that becomes a real physical product

• Growing brand with exciting custom projects

title: Australian Payroll Specialist – STP Phase 2 & Award Compliance
description:
Job Overview:



We are seeking a detail-oriented Accountant/Payroll Specialist with proven Australian experience to manage weekly pay runs for a growing regional tourism business. You must be proficient in reporting via Single Touch Payroll (STP Phase 2) to the ATO







Key Responsibilities:







• Process weekly payroll for employees on Working Holiday Visas (WHV).







• Interpret and apply the Passenger Vehicle Transportation Award [MA000063].







• Ensure accurate 15% tax withholding and 11.5% superannuation contributions.







• Lodge STP reports to the ATO every pay run to maintain a digital record for visa compliance.







• Manage complex reconciliations, including fuel reimbursements and salary sacrifice for vehicle leases.

title: SOP Documentation Specialist – Bakery Systems & Operations (Full-Time, Remote)
description:
???? Job Title: SOP Documentation Specialist – Bakery Systems & Operations (Full-Time, Remote)

???? Employer: Jackson Williams & Partners (Australia-Based Advisory Firm)

???? Location: Remote – Work from Home (Philippines)

???? Salary: PHP 40,000–60,000/month (depending on experience)

? Hours: Full-Time (40 hours/week) | Monday–Friday, Day Shift (AEST-friendly)



?



???? About the Role



We’re looking for a detail-obsessed SOP Documentation Specialist to help standardize and systematize the daily operations of Australian bakeries. You will work closely with our advisory team to convert raw processes, audio notes, and bakery floor footage into clear, step-by-step Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs).



You will document everything from mixing ratios and oven settings to packaging, inventory, staff workflows, and food safety compliance. Your work will directly support operational turnarounds and improve profitability for family-owned bakeries.



?



???? Key Responsibilities

 • Develop clear, concise SOPs in Google Docs, Notion, or PDF templates

 • Translate voice memos, staff interviews, and process outlines into professional documents

 • Create flowcharts, checklists, and visual instructions where needed

 • Ensure SOPs are user-friendly for non-technical bakery staff

 • Maintain consistent formatting, version control, and naming conventions

 • Collaborate with our Australian advisory team to refine and finalise content



?



? You’re a Great Fit If You…

 • Have excellent English writing and documentation skills

 • Have experience writing SOPs or manuals (bonus if in food, hospitality, manufacturing, or logistics)

 • Are fast and reliable with deadlines, drafts, and revisions

 • Have strong formatting, organisation, and file management habits

 • Can interpret audio or unstructured input and turn it into polished systems

 • Bonus: Know how to use Notion, Google Workspace, or L
 / Miro for mapping workflows



?



???? What We Offer

 • Long-term, stable remote position with room for growth

 • Direct work with Australian business owners and advisors

 • Clear briefs, quick feedback, and steady workload

 • Performance bonuses and salary reviews after 3–6 months

 • Friendly, no-drama, systems-focused working culture



?



???? How to Apply



Send your CV + 2 sample SOPs or process documents you’ve written to:



???? 

Subject: SOP Specialist Application – [Your Name]



Applications without samples will not be reviewed. Shortlisted applicants will be invited to complete a paid trial.

title: Virtual Financial Auditor (14-Day Sprint Project) – Part-Time
description:
About Us:



Proclean Property Maintenance is a regional service business based in Queensland, Australia. We’re undertaking a 14-Day Financial Audit Sprint across payroll, job costing, GST, superannuation, and compliance to prepare for an operational turnaround.



?



What You’ll Do:



You’ll assist with reviewing and checking 14 core areas across our business operations:

 • Payroll compliance and superannuation audit

 • GST/BAS coding accuracy

 • Job costing and invoice matching

 • Supplier spend review

 • CapEx and asset register accuracy

 • Leave and timesheet compliance

 • Classification, overtime, on-costs vs quoting margin

 • Fuel & vehicle log reconciliation

 • WorkCover wage reporting cross-check

 • Profitability analysis (top 20 clients)



?



Who We’re Looking For:

 • Experienced with Xero and Australian bookkeeping/payroll standards

 • Knows how to analyze spreadsheets, timesheets, payslips, and award classifications

 • Detail-oriented and able to spot financial inconsistencies

 • Can work independently to a checklist

 • Bonus: Familiar with Australian Fair Work compliance or WHV-related labour rules

title: Brand Strategist & Social Media Manager - (Marketing & Digital Media Focus)
description:
Reports To:  Founder/CEO / Executive Leadership

Department: Marketing & Communications

Employment Type: Full-Time



Position Overview



We are seeking a creative, strategic, and results-driven Brand Strategist & Social Media Manager to lead brand development, digital storytelling, and online engagement for both Thrive Mental Health Clinic (TMHC) 
 and Zikki Nwanne Entertainment (ZNE) 
.



This role will be responsible for building brand visibility, driving audience growth, increasing client/patient acquisition, and elevating both organizations’ digital presence through intentional marketing campaigns, content creation, and data-driven strategy.



The ideal candidate understands how to balance healthcare professionalism with entertainment culture marketing, adapting voice, visuals, and messaging for each audience.



CORE ROLES & RESPONSIBILITIES



1. Brand Strategy & Development



* Develop and execute comprehensive brand strategies for TMHC and ZNE.

* Ensure brand consistency across all platforms, campaigns, and materials.

* Refine brand voice, messaging frameworks, and storytelling narratives.

* Conduct brand audits and competitive analysis.

* Identify growth opportunities to increase brand equity and recognition.

* Create brand guidelines (fonts, colors, tone, imagery).



2. Social Media Management



* Manage all social media platforms, including but not limited to:



  * Instagram

  *

  * TikTok

  * LinkedIn

  * YouTube

  * X 
)

* Create, schedule, and publish engaging content calendars.

* Maintain posting consistency aligned with marketing goals.

* Monitor comments, DMs, and community engagement.

* Respond to inquiries in a timely and brand-appropriate tone.

* Grow followers organically and through campaigns.



3. Content Creation & Creative Direction



* Develop high-quality content, including:



  * Graphics

  * Reels & short-form videos

  * Educational carousels

  * Event flyers

  * Promotional trailers

  * Testimonials & patient stories (HIPAA compliant)

* Direct photoshoots and video shoots.

* Collaborate with videographers, photographers, and designers.

* Write captions, hashtags, and CTAs optimized for reach.



4. Marketing Campaigns & Promotions



* Plan and execute marketing campaigns for:



  * Mental health awareness initiatives (TMHC)

  * Events, brunches, nightlife, and cultural experiences (ZNE)

* Launch promotional funnels for:



  * Patient acquisition

  * Event ticket sales

  * Brand partnerships

* Coordinate seasonal campaigns and launches.

* Develop influencer and ambassador collaborations.



5. Digital Advertising & Analytics



* Run paid ads across:



  * Meta 
/Instagram)

  * Google Ads

  * TikTok Ads

  * YouTube

* Track KPIs such as:



  * Engagement rates

  * Conversion rates

  * Ticket sales

  * Patient bookings

  * ROI on ad spend

* Provide monthly performance reports.

* Optimize campaigns using analytics insights.



6. Website & SEO Optimization



* Update and optimize website content for both brands:



  * Service pages

  * Event pages

  * Blogs

  * Booking funnels

* Improve SEO rankings and online discoverability.

* Integrate lead capture forms and CRM pipelines.



7. Partnership & Influencer Marketing



* Identify and secure brand partnerships.

* Manage influencer collaborations and promo exchanges.

* Coordinate cross-promotional campaigns.

* Build relationships with community organizations and media outlets.



8. Event Marketing (ZNE Focus)



* Promote nightlife and cultural events.

* Create event countdown campaigns.

* Manage ticket platform integrations (Posh, Eventbrite, etc.).

* Coordinate street team and promoter marketing assets.



9. Healthcare Marketing Compliance (TMHC Focus)



* Ensure all marketing aligns with HIPAA and healthcare regulations.

* Maintain patient confidentiality in storytelling.

* Position TMHC as a trusted mental health authority.



KEY DELIVERABLES



* Monthly content calendars (dual brand)

* Campaign strategy decks

* Social media analytics reports

* Paid ad performance reports

* Brand partnership pipelines

* Event promo rollouts

* Website content updates



QUALIFICATIONS



* Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, Branding, or related field (preferred).

* 2–5+ years in brand strategy or social media management.

* Experience in healthcare or entertainment marketing is a plus.

* Strong understanding of digital marketing funnels.

* Proficiency in tools such as:



  * Canva / Adobe Suite

  * Meta Business Manager

  * Hootsuite / Buffer / Later

  * Google Analytics

  * CapCut / Final Cut / Premiere Pro



CORE COMPETENCIES



* Creative storytelling

* Strategic thinking

* Cultural awareness

* Data analysis

* Visual branding

* Campaign execution

* Communication skills

* Trend forecasting



SUCCESS METRICS (KPIs)



* Social media growth rate

* Engagement & reach

* Patient bookings (TMHC)

* Event ticket sales (ZNE)

title: Full-Time Remote Davinci Editor — VYBE
description:
Full-Time Remote Video Editor — VYBE



About Us

VYBE is a Illinois US based photo and video company that brings brand stories to life. We create content for campaigns, product launches, social media, and event activations. Our work is energetic, authentic, and visually engaging. We’re growing fast and looking for someone who’s excited to grow with us.



Position Overview

We’re looking for a Full-Time Remote Video Editor who works exclusively in DaVinci Resolve — someone organized, reliable, and passionate about storytelling. You’ll help bring branded projects to life across short-form and long-form formats, including social reels, product promos, and event recaps.



Why DaVinci Resolve?

At VYBE, collaboration is everything. DaVinci Resolve allows our team to work together seamlessly — sharing timelines, color grades, and adjustments in real time. This helps us stay efficient, creative, and consistent across every project.



What You’ll Do



Edit branded content, product features, promos, and social videos



Organize and manage project timelines and assets



Collaborate closely with our creative director for revisions and feedback



Maintain consistent pacing, color, and energy that match the VYBE style



Explore new editing trends and techniques to keep content fresh



What We’re Looking For



Expert-level experience in DaVinci Resolve (required)



Strong sense of rhythm, pacing, and visual storytelling



Reliable communication and attention to deadlines



Organized, detail-oriented, and eager to learn



Positive attitude and a team-first mindset



What We Offer



Remote, full-time position



Consistent projects and long-term growth opportunities



Flexible schedule tied to project deadlines



Supportive and collaborative creative team



How to Apply

No résumé needed — we care most about your skills and personality.

Please send:



A few samples of your editing work (brand or social content preferred)



A short message about who you are, your experience, and why you love editing



Send everything to our
 with the subject line:

“VYBE EDITING2026 — [Your Name]”

title: Loan Processor
description:
About Us



Globus Lending is a fast-growing real estate investment lending company that works with banks, private lenders, and hedge funds to help investors finance real estate deals. We are looking for a detail-oriented Loan Processor to help manage files, communicate with our team, and keep transactions moving toward closing.



?



Role Overview



We are seeking a reliable and organized Loan Processor who understands real estate lending terminology, communicates clearly in English, and can help keep loan files structured and on track. You will work closely with our sales team, underwriters, and operations staff to help close deals efficiently.



?



Key Responsibilities

 • Process and manage real estate loan files from intake to closing

 • Review documents for accuracy and completeness

 • Organize and maintain digital loan folders and CRM records

 • Communicate with borrowers, lenders, and internal tea
mbers

 • Track conditions, deadlines, and follow-ups

 • Assist with collecting documents such as bank statements, insurance, appraisals, and title items

 • Help ensure loans move smoothly through underwriting and closing



?



Requirements

 • Strong written and spoken English communication skills

 • Experience in real estate lending, mortgages, or loan processing preferred

 • Understanding of loan terminology (LTV, DSCR, underwriting conditions, title, escrow, etc.)

 • Highly organized with strong attention to detail

 • Comfortable working with CRMs, Google Drive, and online tools

 • Ability to multitask and work in a fast-paced environment

 • Reliable internet connection and professional work setup



?



Preferred (Not Required)

 • Experience with U.S. real estate or investment property loans

 • Familiarity with Zoho CRM, lending platforms, or transaction coordination

 • Previous work with U.S.-based real estate companies



?



What We Offer

 • Work with a growing U.S. real estate lending company

 • Supportive and team-focused environment

 • Opportunity for growth as the company scales

 • Opportunity for Bonuses every Month





?



How to Apply



Please include:

 1. Your resume

 2. A short voice recording introducing yourself (to assess English communication)

 3. Your experience with loan processing or real estate files  - 3 to 5 Sentences

title: Virtual Assistant in Admin & Customer Service
description:
We’re seeking a Virtual Assistant to join our team. This role involves managing customer service tasks, organizing
 communications, and assisting with administrative responsibilities. You’ll play a key part in keeping operations smooth and customers happy.



Key Responsibilities:

- Handle all incoming customer communication from new and existing clients (calls,
s, messages)

- Preform sales phone call follow-up

- Perform administrative tasks related to billing, invoicing, and records

- Manage and update customer records in our CRM

- Keep internal systems organized and updated

- Support process improvements and help keep operations moving efficiently

- Document processes and maintain organization across digital platforms like Gmail, Google Drive, and Slack.



Requirements:

- Fluent English, both written and spoken

- Clear, professional communication skills

- Strong organizational and time management ability

- Solid technical skills and ability to learn new software quickly

- Problem-solver who takes ownership of outcomes

- Supportive and collaborative tea
mbers

title: Go High Level Expert
description:
GoHighLevel Expert Needed – Full System Build (URGENT)



(Overview)

I’m looking for a high-level GoHighLevel (GHL) expert to build out my entire system ASAP.

This is not a small setup job — I need someone who understands end-to-end automation,
 Ads ? CRM ? Booking ? Follow-ups ? Sales pipelines.





I run a fast-growing service business and need this built properly, cleanly, and scalable.





Scope of Work (Must Be Able to Do All)

You will be responsible for designing, building, and implementing the entire GoHighLevel ecosystem, including:



1:
 Ads Integration

 Lead Forms & Website forms triggering GHL

Correct field mapping

Instant lead capture (no delays)

Multiple campaign types supported (services, emergencies, bookings)



2: CRM & Pipelines

Custom pipelines for different services

Lead stages (New ? Contacted ? Quoted ? Booked ? Completed)

Automated stage movement

Clear visibility for admin & sales staff



3: Automations & Workflows

SMS +
 automation sequences

Speed-to-lead automations (under 60 seconds)

Missed call text back

Follow-ups for unresponsive leads

Appointment reminders & confirmations

Re-activation campaigns for old leads



4: Booking & Calendars

Automated booking calendars

Round-robin (if needed)

Confirmation + reminder logic

No-show reduction systems

Intelligent routing (service-based logic)

Conditional workflows based on customer responses



6: System Clean-Up & Optimisation

Proper naming conventions

Clean workflow logic

No spaghetti automation

Easy to scale and duplicate



Requirements (Non-Negotiable)

You MUST:

Be highly experienced with GoHighLevel (not learning on the job)

Have real examples of systems you’ve built

Understand
 Ads ? GHL workflows deeply

Be able to work FAST (this is urgent)

Communicate clearly and professionally

Think strategically, not just “build buttons”



Do NOT apply if:



You are new to GoHighLevel

You only build basic funnels

You rely on generic templates without understanding logic



Timeline

Immediate start

Initial system live within days, not weeks

Ongoing optimisation after launch

Open to fixed price or hourly, depending on experience.

I will pay top dollar for someone who can deliver properly and fast.



Bonus Points If You Have Experience With



Service-based businesses (trades, local services)



Call tracking & missed call automation



Scaling systems across multiple services



Long-term system optimisation

Examples or screenshots of systems you’ve built

title: Bookkeeper - Australia | Long-term | Training Provided
description:
G'day from Sydney!



We are an advertising company, working with the Philippines for 12 years! And we are looking to add one long-ter
mber to our core team.



The role involves working in a small accounts team of three, and liaising daily with Australian core team. Tasks include entering a high number of bills and transactions into accounting software, creating client invoices and booking forms, financial reporting, matching transactions, calculating payroll, and other bookkeeping and admin tasks. 

This role is exclusive, meaning if you work with our company, you cannot work elsewhere.



You MUST have 2+ years existing bookkeeping experience to apply (or have attained your CPA accreditation). And, have worked for a single employer for a minimum of 2 years, in any role.





YOU WILL LEARN

- Australian bookkeeping standards

- Australian Tax essentials

- Australian employment structures

- How to calculate Australian Payroll

- The fundamentals of Australian Workplace Culture





WHAT TO EXPECT

- Contractor, not an employee

- Remote / Work from Home

- Work with a long-term Australian and Filipino team.

- Hours are 6:30am - 3:30pm PST, Monday to Friday with a 1 hour lunch each day.

- PHP22000 per calendar month, paid fortnightly (PHP10154 per fortnight).

- Up to PHP25000 per calendar month if you have existing Australian bookkeeping history.

- Payment in PHP through Wise (not AUD or USD).

- Pay review at 3 months and 12 months

- Daily, Weekly, Fortnightly and Monthly bookkeeping responsibilities, including reporting.





To Apply - REQUIRED

Apply through Online Jobs, quoting reference AB2026. Tell us a little about yourself. With most recent first, list your last three jobs with one line per job, including name of company, role title, number of months, and typical hours worked per week (eg, ZYX Corp, Bookkeeper, 36 months, 28 hours per week). Attach your CV and tell us why this role appeals to you. And, outside of family, tell us about two people you aspire to, and why.

title: Full-Charge Bookkeeper Needed 2026
description:

If you learned bookkeeping by using QuickBooks, this is not for you. Your knowledge of accounting should be so strong that you are able to double-entry bookkeep using Excel. Or better yet, a good old notebook.



Must be fluent in English and technologically savvy.



Working hours are Pacific Standard Time (graveyard shift for the Philippines). * You must be on video during work hours, so you must have a fast and reliable internet connection. We all work in a virtual office environment so this is important.

Please include your RESUME/CV when applying for this job. This will expedite the reviewing process - in your favor.

We don't need long Cover Letters - short, concise, and to the point is better.

title: Amazon Fee & Unit Economics Management Accountant
description:
Urgent Hiring: Amazon Fee & Unit Economics Management Accountant

Reports To: CEO

Work Hours: Philippines daytime work hours



ONLY APPLICANTS WHO WILL APPLY THROUGH THE LINK WILL BE ENTERTAINED.



Company Vision:

We want to work with you to grow our company while helping you to become a superstar in your field. We value problem solvers, go getters, people with opinions who want to make an impact. You will be on the leading edge of Amazon and online strategies and will be continually improving your knowledge in the pursuit of helping us grow our business.

At the same time, you will be working with a company that values community & family in both our internal and customer facing sides. Our mission is to delight kids & parents with creative craft kits and related products. We are 100% focused on that mission and want you to be there on the ride with us!

That’s where you come in as our next Amazon Fee & Unit Economics Management Accountant



Role Purpose

Own, track, and optimize every cost that impacts Amazon unit economics, so leadership always has a clear, accurate, and optimized view of true ASIN-level profitability.



What Success Looks Like:

Success in this role means true Amazon profitability is no longer a guessing game. Every ASIN has a fully loaded cost that includes product cost, shipping, duties, Amazon fees, affiliate commissions, and ranking-related marketing spend. Leadership can confidently d
 which products to scale, reprice, suppress, liquidate, or discontinue based on real data — not blended averages or assumptions.



A top performer in this role consistently reduces total Amazon unit costs while improving cost visibility. Through tight auditing, proactive fee recovery, smarter shipping and duty tracking, and disciplined attribution of affiliate and ranking spend, this role directly increases contribution margin without increasing ad spend or revenue risk.



Primary Objectives

• Amazon Fee, Shipping & Cost Auditing

Own end-to-end auditing of all Amazon, logistics, and ranking-related costs.

• Fully Loaded ASIN-Level Unit Economics

Maintain accurate per-unit costs including shipping, duties, fees, affiliates, and marketing.

• Cost Optimization & Reduction

Identify and implement cost-saving opportunities across fees, logistics, and promotional spend.

• Profitability & Decision Support

Provide leadership with clean, reliable Amazon cost and margin reporting.



Regular Work Activities

• Audit all Amazon FBA fees (pick/pack, weight, storage, returns)

• Track short-term and long-term storage fees by ASIN

• Monitor aged inventory fees and cost exposure

• Track AWD inbound, storage, and handling fees

• Reconcile inbound placement fees

• Track removal, disposal, and liquidation costs

• Track international shipping costs (factory ? port ? Amazon)

• Allocate shipping cost per unit by shipment and ASIN

• Track duties, tariffs, customs, and brokerage fees

• Maintain landed cost per unit calculations

• Track affiliate commissions tied to Amazon sales

• Attribute affiliate spend at ASIN or product-group level

• Track ranking, launch, and promotional marketing costs

• Identify unprofitable or fee-heavy SKUs

• Submit and track Amazon reimbursement claims

• Create monthly Amazon cost & margin reports

• Monitor fee and cost trend anomalies

• Maintain SOPs for Amazon cost tracking and audits



Key Skills Required

• Understanding & ability to learn Amazon FBA fee structures

• Strong grasp of landed cost accounting

• Advanced spreadsheet skills

• Experience with SKU-level profitability modeling

• Strong analytical and investigative mindset

• High attention to detail

• Ability to reconcile complex datasets

• Process-driven

• Cost-reduction oriented thinking

• Clear written & verbal communication



People Contacts and Interactions – What are the primary people contacts in this job (who, why, and how often)?

• Direct report to the CEO

• Frequent communication with

• Operations Team

• Logistics Team



Role Requirements

Experience, Training, and Education

• 2+ years working with Amazon Seller Central data

• Experience tracking shipping, duties, and landed costs

• Familiarity with FBA, AWD, and storage fee structures

• Advanced spreadsheet proficiency required

• E-commerce or marketplace finance experience preferred

• Experience submitting Amazon reimbursement claims preferred

• Comfortable owning ASIN-level economics end-to-end

• Strong personal accountability

• Not responsible for tax, payroll, AR/AP, or general bookkeeping



How to Apply:

Click the link - 
/o/JB-AGUZM8V3D/landing?u=
ONLY APPLICANTS WHO WILL APPLY THROUGH THE LINK WILL BE ENTERTAINED.

title: Amazon PPC Manager
description:
Urgent Hiring: Amazon PPC Manager

Reports To: CEO / Amazon Optimization Manager

Work Hours: Philippines Daytime Work Hours



ONLY APPLICANTS WHO WILL APPLY THROUGH THE LINK WILL BE ENTERTAINED.



Company Vision

We want to work with you to grow our company while helping you to become a superstar in your field. We value problem solvers, go-getters, and people with opinions who want to make an impact. You will be on the leading edge of Amazon and online strategies, continually improving your knowledge in the pursuit of helping us grow our business.



At the same time, you will be working with a company that values community & family—both internally and customer-facing. Our mission is to delight kids & parents with creative craft kits and related products. We are 100% focused on that mission and want you to be there on the ride with us!



That’s where you come in as our next Amazon PPC Manager.



Role Purpose

The Amazon PPC Manager owns the performance of all paid advertising on Amazon across our catalog. This person leads the strategy, execution, and optimization of all Sponsored Product, Sponsored Brand, and Sponsored Display campaigns to drive discoverability, revenue growth, and profitable scaling.



You will leverage Scale Insights daily—using advanced features like automation flows, keyword scoring, search term mining, and campaign-level rule logic—to drive high-impact decisions. Your ability to move beyond manual optimization and harness automation for scale is critical to success in this role.



What Success Looks Like

You consistently drive performance improvements using both manual and automated techniques, with Scale Insights as your core control panel. You own automation flows that intelligently adjust bids, pause underperforming targets, surface search term goldmines, and scale winners. You don’t just use Scale Insights—you master it.



You maintain a proactive and adaptive PPC strategy aligned with the catalog lifecycle, launch timing, and seasonality. Through frequent reporting, experimentation, and coordination with SEO, creative, and ops, you ensure campaigns support profitable, long-term growth.



Primary Objectives

Maximize profitable growth through advanced automation using Scale Insights

Own and optimize campaign architecture to drive ROI across all product stages

Partner cross-functionally for ad-aligned launches, creatives, and keyword strategy

Test, measure, and iterate to continuously improve CTR, CVR, and ROAS



Regular Work Activities

Monitor and refine SP/SB/SD campaigns daily through Scale Insights dashboards

Execute bid adjustments, search term mining, negative pruning

Build and optimize automation rules and flows in Scale Insights

Audit underperforming ad groups and apply automated corrective logic

Set up rule-based triggers for seasonal budget shifts and event-based bidding

Conduct A/B testing for headlines, images, placements

Weekly reporting with commentary using Scale Insights and custom dashboards

Work with SEO to align ad keyword targeting with organic ranking efforts

Collaborate with creative to ensure ad assets match campaign goals

Track budget utilization and reallocate funds based on real-time data

Maintain documentation and SOPs for all Scale Insights workflows

Guide PPC Assistants on implementing and QA’ing automation rules

Troubleshoot disapproved or underperforming ads

Flag inventory and pricing concerns affecting campaign viability

Maintain performance calendars for launches, promos, seasonality



Key Skills

Advanced knowledge of Scale Insights (automation, keyword scoring, flows)

Deep understanding of Amazon Ads (SP, SB, SD)

Strategic and analytical mindset with strong Excel/Google Sheets skills

Mastery in keyword match types, campaign structure, and budget management

Proven record of improving CTR, CVR, and ROAS

Excellent reporting and data storytelling skills

Detail-oriented with strong project tracking ability

Comfortable owning results, fixing issues, and moving fast

Strong communication across SEO, creative, and leadership teams

Passionate about learning and applying new ad techniques



People Contacts and Interactions

SEO Manager: Weekly coordination for keyword and ranking overlap

Creative Team: Weekly/as needed for ad assets, testing needs

Operations: Weekly or ad-hoc for stock, pricing, launch strategy

CEO / Leadership: Weekly/monthly reporting, performance reviews



Role Requirements

3+ years managing Amazon PPC campaigns

Experience using Scale Insights (must demonstrate real automation flow use cases, not just dashboards)

Proven success managing TACoS, ACOS, ROAS in high-SKU environments

Experience launching campaigns for new products and scaling mature ones

High proficiency in Excel or Google Sheets

Familiarity with keyword research, ranking tools, and performance reporting

Experience with automation strategy, not just manual optimization

Self-starter with high personal accountability and ownership

Bonus: Experience in creative ad testing and headline writing



How to Apply:

Click the link - 
/o/JB-7HSMY4Q39/landing

title: TikTok Creator Scout / Outreach
description:
Summary

Virtual Assistant Job Post — Kings Closet Creator Scout



Job Title: TikTok Creator Scout / Outreach VA

Part-time



About Us

Kings Closet is a peer-to-peer luxury menswear rental platform. Rent grails you can't justify buying. Wear archive pieces without the commitment. Access $5,000 fits for a fraction.

We're for the hypebeast who wants to wear every drop, the content creator who needs rotation, the guy with a wedding next weekend, and the fashion head who wants to experience pieces without owning them.

Launching soon. Need help finding TikTok creators to spread the word.



The Role

You'll spend 2-3 hours/day scrolling TikTok, finding creators who fit our vibe, logging their info, and sending outreach DMs/emails.

Simple work. If you're already on TikTok all day, get paid for it.



What You'll Do

1. Find Creators (Daily)



Scroll TikTok using search terms we provide

Find 15-20 creators per day that match our target profiles

Log their info in a Google Sheet (username, followers, avg views, contact info, link to best video)



2. Send Outreach (Daily)



DM creators on TikTok or Instagram



 creators if
 is available in bio/Linktree

Use templates we provide (you can personalize)

Track responses in the sheet



3. Report Back



Daily update: how many creators found, outreach sent, replies received

Flag any creators who seem like great fits





Creator Profiles You're Looking For

We want a MIX of creator types:

Hypebeast / Streetwear Guys



Posts fit pics, sneaker pickups, hauls

Into brands like Rick Owens, Chrome Hearts, Kapital, Raf Simons, Margiela, vintage archive

Talks about drops, grails, resale



GRWM / Lifestyle Guys



"Get ready with me" content

Outfit of the day, what I wore today

Dating content, first date outfits

Day in my life with fashion focus



Self-Improvement / Level Up Guys



"How to look better as a man"

Glow up content

Style tips for men

"How to look expensive on a budget"



Fashion Enthusiasts / Reviewers



Talks about quality, craftsmanship, styling

"Is it worth it" reviews

Archive fashion appreciation

Designer breakdowns



Event / Occasion Guys



Wedding guest outfits

What to wear to X

Formal / semi-formal styling





General Criteria



Male, 18-35

1,
,000 followers (micro to mid-tier)

Good on camera OR good at visual content

Posts consistently (at least 2x per week)

Engaged audience (comments, not just views)





Search Terms to Use

Streetwear / Hypebeast:



"hypebeast outfit"

"streetwear fit"

"archive fashion"

"rick owens fit"

"chrome hearts outfit"

"grail pickup"

"sneaker fit"

"designer haul men"



GRWM / Lifestyle:



"men's GRWM"

"fit check men"

"men's outfit of the day"

"what I wore today men"

"first date outfit men"

"dating profile photos men"



Self-Improvement:



"how to dress better men"

"men's style tips"

"how to look expensive"

"level up your style"

"glow up men"

"dress like you have money"



Fashion / Reviews:



"is it worth it fashion"

"designer on a budget"

"styling tips men"

"fashion review men"

"kapital styling"



Events:



"wedding guest outfit men"

"what to wear to a wedding"

"formal outfit men"

"black tie outfit"





What We're Looking For in You



You're already on TikTok a lot

You can recognize good content and aesthetic

Organized and reliable — log everything properly

Good written English for outreach

Work independently, don't need hand-holding

Responsive on Slack/
/WhatsApp

$1 for every creator who responds interested

title: Business Development Manager (Remote)
description:
- Department: Growth & Business Development

- Location: Remote

- Compensation: $600 base + up to $200 performance commission

- Employment Type: Full-time



We are a fast-growing multi-brand e-commerce group building lean, systemized businesses with a strong focus on quality partnerships and operational excellence.

Our vision is not just to grow, but to scale with structure, clean data, and intentional execution. We don’t chase leads just to chase numbers.



We build pipelines, systems, and partnerships that move the business forward.

We’re lean. We’re profitable. We move fast.

No unnecessary meetings. No fluff. Just meaningful growth, driven by accountable operators.

This is a remote role for someone who takes ownership, builds clear processes, and delivers measurable results.



Mission & Impact

As the Business Development Manager (BDM), your mission is to own the entire partnership pipeline from start to finish, identifying, engaging, qualifying, closing, and handing off high-quality supplier and brand relationships for multiple group companies, including SGP and emerging entities.

You will be the first point of contact for our future partners. You will represent the business — with credibility, clarity, and confidence — and help grow the brands in a structured, scalable way.

This is not a reactive role.

You will proactively prospect, qualify, convert, and systemize partner engagement processes so that business development becomes predictable, measurable, and impactful.





What You Will Do

-Lead Sourcing & Qualification

-Manage and prioritise all inbound and outbound leads 

-Maintain accurate, up-to-date lead statuses, notes, and next steps

-Qualify leads using the approved Brand Qualification Framework

-Outreach & Engagement

-Proactively reach out to potential brands via phone and

-Consistently follow up, build rapport, and represent the business with confidence

-Position opportunities in a way that aligns with partner business goals and our brand standards



Closing & Handover

-Present qualified leads internally when required

-Close partnerships that meet brand criteria and confirm onboarding readiness

-Execute a clean and structured handover to Operations and Finance with complete information

-Reporting & Data Hygiene

-Maintain accurate records of calls,
s, follow-ups, and outcomes

-Ensure CRM data accuracy of 95% or higher

-Provide regular updates on pipeline status, progress, and blockers



You Should Excel In This Role If You…

-Have 2+ years of experience in business development, sales, or partnerships

-Communicate persuasively and professionally in written and verbal outreach

-Are comfortable making outbound calls and structured follow-ups

-Are highly organised, process-driven, and disciplined with data

-Can work autonomously and effectively in a fully remote environment



Bonus Points For:

-Experience working with brands, suppliers, or e-commerce companies

-Familiarity with CRM tools and structured sales pipelines

-A strong eye for detail and follow-through execution



What Success Looks Like (First 90 Days)

-You own and run the Business Development pipeline independently

-You consistently convert leads into qualified partnerships

-You maintain excellent data hygiene and tracking

-You can negotiate on terms (margins, etc.)

-You contribute to improvements in outreach, tracking, or qualification workflows

-You become a trusted operator who grows partnerships with quality and intention



Compensation & Structure

-Base Salary: $600/month

-Commission: Up to $200/month (performance-based)

-Total Potential: Up to $800/month

-Clear expectations, transparent commission, measurable performance targets — and the opportunity to influence brand growth strategy directly.



Why Join Us

-Transparent performance expectations

-Lean, efficient, growth-focused teams

-Exposure to multiple growing brands

-Opportunity to shape the future of our partnership strategy

-10 days paid time off 

-Other team based monthly incentives 



How to Apply

-Submit your most recent CV / resume

-Record a 60–90 second Loom video introducing yourself and explaining why you’re the right fit for this role

-If shortlisted, complete a short assessment task (5 minutes) 

Final interview with the leadership team

title: Customer Support & Class Coordinator for Ballet Program
description:
About the Role

RDBC exists to make world?class ballet training accessible to serious dancers anywhere. To do that at scale, we need flawless class execution and fast, accurate support.



This role’s job is simple to say, hard to do:

Run our online classes smoothly, handle support with care, and make sure no interested dancer falls through the cracks.



You will not be asked to “build the company.” You will be asked to run the playbook: follow and improve checklists, scripts, and systems designed with you by our EA.



Apply Here: 



Outcomes (What Winning Looks Like)

In this role, success means:



Support SLA Hit

- 95%+ of simple support tickets 
/DM) answered within 1 business day.

- 80%+ resolved on the first reply using existing scripts/FAQs.



Classes Run Smoothly

- 100% of assigned classes start on time with Zoom working and students in the right room.

- 98%+ of classes completed with no major tech / access issues escalated to the founder.



Leads Handled & Passed Correctly

- 100% of inbound class/program inquiries acknowledged.

- 90%+ of qualified leads moved to the correct next step:

- 0 unlogged leads (all are captured in our system).



Clean Data & Checklists

- Attendance and short class reports submitted same?day for 100% of live classes you support.

- Follows SOPs and flags issues so the EA can improve the system.



Responsibilities

Live Class Support

- Host / co?host Zoom classes: start meetings, admit students, manage chat, and support teachers.

- Share links, handle basic “can’t find the link / wrong time” issues in real time.

- Submit attendance and a short class report after each session.



Customer Support

- Answer routine support questions via
 and DMs using provided scripts and FAQs.

- Solve login, schedule, and “where do I find X?” issues without needing the founder.



Lead Handling (Scripted)

- Respond to inbound messages asking about our programs.

- Ask simple qualifying questions and route leads according to our rules:

- Send correct information / links

- Book calls or direct to applications for advanced programs

- Log leads and outcomes in our system (Notion / CRM).



Systems & Improvement

- Follow checklists for classes, support, and leads.

- Spot patterns in questions / problems and suggest improvements to scripts and SOPs.



Requirements

- 2+ years in customer support, community management, or operations for an online program, school, or service business based in US (call centers do NOT qualify)

- Strong written English; clear, concise, professional.

- Comfortable with tech: Zoom,
, DMs, Notion / spreadsheets.

- Reliable across time zones; willing to work a consistent schedule aligned with our live classes (details in interview).

- You like structure, checklists, and making sure nothing slips through the cracks.

- Must work Monday to Saturday

title: Customer Support (Written) | No Experience Needed | FUN| Dance Academy
description:
Full-time, long-term opportunity.



Looking for:

- Outstanding English

- Empathy



Our communications with students are FRIENDLY, FUN, and PERSONAL.



ABOUT US

We are the largest salsa & bachata dance academy in Los Angeles and are growing rapidly.



The culture here is FUN, fast, and friendly. Our goal is to make every student feel welcome and completely taken care of.



Dancing changes lives - we are on a mission to deliver the best salsa/bachata educational experience on Earth.



The company is MaS Dance Academy.





ABOUT YOUR TEAM

Working with a remote team that helps with all facets of the business, you'll form a close working relationship and bond with your team mates. We even host team retreats in the Philippines!





SCHEDULE

All times written in PST (Los Angeles time)



TRAINING (2-4 weeks):

Monday-Friday 9am - 6pm (with 1 hour break)



AFTER TRAINING:

Wednesday, Thursday, Friday 1pm-10pm (with 1 hour break)

Saturday, Sunday 9am - 6pm (with 1 hour break)





YOUR ROLE

• Your primary role is written student support (text,
 etc.)

• When there are no support tasks to complete, you'll contribute in a wide variety of other ways, depending on your skills and interests. Some examples may include writing blogs, updating websites, doing research, collecting and analyzing numerical data and using it to create reports, etc.





WRITTEN VS PHONE SUPPORT

• 95% of our student support is written. However, occasionally you will need to be on the phone with a student. You must be comfortable on the phone.





TYPES OF SUPPORT YOU'LL HANDLE

• One on one texting and
ing

• Mass texting and
ing

• Occasional phone calls (rare)

• Updating database after every interaction and attempted interaction

• Daily reports

• Etc.





COMPANY CULTURE

Working in a small business like ours is very different from a large corporation. Some of the differences are:



• Personal tone: Our communications with students are FRIENDLY, FUN, and PERSONAL. It's like talking to your best friend. We use emoji's and exclamation points and are very personal. We take the opposite approach of large corporations that give robotic, frustrating, not very helpful support. You need to be intuitive and have strong emotional intelligence to feel what the students are needing when they communicate.



• More creativity: there is more freedom to adjust your responses for each scenario. This is more challenging than just following strict templates, but also more stimulating and exciting.



• Impact: your actions will have a big impact on the business, which you will clearly see



• Feedback: your feedback on what we are doing well, and what could be better, is not only valued, but is mandatory! We want everyone here thinking as if they were the business owner.





ABOUT YOU

• Perfect written English

• Available full-time

• High emotional intelligence

• Flexible

• Quick learner

• Thrives in fast-paced, quickly changing environment

• Desire to always seek better ways to do things, including finding ways to use A.I. tools

• Happy to be on the phone when needed (which is rarely)

• Tremendous attention to detail - gets things right the first time

• PRO-ACTIVE. Always looking for ways to improve.

• Meticulous, organized, methodical. Almost never misses a detail.

• Critical, creative thinker. Not robotic. Always looking for better ways to do things. Always considering all the angles of a task.

• Not afraid to share your opinion - we NEED to hear your opinion on the approaches that we take so that we can improve.

• Able to ask clarifying questions in order to get tasks right the first time

• Strong communicator

• Makes decisions independently

• Quick learner

• Fast computer

• Fast, dependable Internet

• Bonus if you have experience or interest in salsa or bachata or any dance!





APPLY NOW. FORMAT YOUR APPLICATION AS A NUMBERED LIST WITH THE FOLLOWING:

1. A brief intro about yourself



2. Are you happy to be on the phone when needed?



3. This is a fast-paced environment with quickly changing conditions. You’ll need to be able to think quickly on your feet and track dozens of moving pieces at once with precision and accuracy. This role is NOT for people who feel overly anxious in this type of environment. Apply only if you thrive in such an environment. Based on this information, do you still feel this role is a good fit for you?



4. Complete this form: 
/
. Write in the subject line of your application the answers to the assessment in the link above: 1. Grammar score 2. Typing WPM 3. Numbers assessment answer (regarding achieving $2,000 profit) 4. Highest level of formal education



6. Any customer support experience? If yes, please describe.



7. Any sales experience? (Not required - bonus). If yes, please describe.



8. These positions are competitive, often with hundreds of applicants. What is your competitive requested monthly payment for this full-time position?





(Don't
 us off the platform or message on social media - your application will be disqualified. Don't worry, we personally check every application here)



Looking forward to meeting you!

title: Lead Generation & Strategic Partnerships Specialist (High-Ticket)
description:
Brand Overview:

Moshe Wigder 
 is a high-authority Expert Advisor with a community of 290,000+ followers and 10 million+ monthly views. His mission is simple: help people navigate the "Shvitz" of the real estate market. By providing the raw, unedited truth, Moshe empowers others to succeed in a complex industry. We are now seeking a specialist to help us identify and connect with strategic partners (Lenders, Tech, and Financial Services) who share our commitment to providing genuine value and honest navigation to our community.



The Role:

This is a high-responsibility "Hunter" position. You will not be doing general admin. You will report to the Operations Manager and be responsible for identifying decision-makers at US-based lenders, fintech companies, and service providers. Your goal is to initiate professional contact and open doors for $10,000+ strategic partnerships.



Daily Responsibilities:

-Conduct deep research into US-based companies (Lenders, CRM software, Insurance) that align with a high-trust real estate expert brand.

-Source 20 "A-Tier" leads daily with verified direct
s for Marketing Directors or VPs of Growth.

-Execute personalized outreach via
 and LinkedIn.

-Manage the business inbox and triage responses to the COO.

-Maintain the Master Lead Tracker.



Professional Requirements:

Applicants must have a native-level command of English and a track record of B2B communication. We require proficiency in LinkedIn and lead-sourcing tools. This role requires someone who understands the "Shvitz"—the relentless pursuit of quality. To ensure you have read this entire post, please ensure your application subject line begins with the word 'Shvitz' followed by your favorite real estate niche.



Application Process: 

In your cover letter, please:

-Analyze one of Moshe's recent IG videos. Identify one brand that would be a natural fit for a partnership on that specific post and explain why.

-Share a link or screenshot of a lead list you have curated previously.

-Confirm availability for 20 hours per week.



Compensation:

Base Pay: $6.00/hour.

Strategic Bonus: A flat $150.00 USD bounty for every successfully closed Strategic Partnership resulting from your lead.

title: Coding and Clinical Documentation Specialist
description:
#Direct Client

#PST Hours ONLY



The Coding and Clinical Documentation Specialist is responsible for ensuring that clinical documentation accurately reflects the services provided and aligns with regulatory requirements. This role plays a key part in optimizing coding accuracy, improving reimbursement processes, and supporting the clinic's commitment to compliance and high-quality patient care. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in medical coding, clinical documentation improvement (CDI), and familiarity with telehealth standards.



Review and assign accurate ICD-10, CPT, and HCPCS codes to patient diagnoses and procedures, following industry and regulatory standards.

Work closely with clinical staff to ensure accurate and complete coding that reflects the services provided, maintaining compliance with federal and state regulations.

Monitor and apply updates to coding guidelines, ensuring that all codes reflect the most current practices.

Evaluate clinical documentation to ensure it supports the assigned codes and provides an accurate portrayal of patient health status and care provided.

Collaborate with healthcare providers to clarify documentation and provide guidance on proper coding practices to optimize coding accuracy.

Conduct regular documentation audits and develop improvement plans to address any identified gaps or discrepancies.

Ensure compliance with healthcare regulations, including HIPAA, CMS guidelines, and coding standards to minimize risk and protect patient information.

Participate in internal and external audits, providing documentation and insight to maintain compliance with coding standards.

Implement quality assurance measures to continually improve coding and documentation accuracy, reducing denials and optimizing reimbursement.



Screening Questions



How many years of experience do you have in medical coding or clinical documentation improvement (CDI) within a US healthcare environment?



Please list the coding software, EHR systems, or auditing tools you have used and indicate your proficiency level (Beginner / Intermediate / Advanced).



How often did you perform coding reviews, documentation audits, or provider queries in your previous roles?

(Daily / Weekly / Monthly)



What is your level of familiarity with ICD-10, CPT, and HCPCS coding standards, as well as CMS and HIPAA compliance requirements? Please rate your knowledge on a scale of 1 to 5 (1 = no knowledge, 5 = expert).



Please send your updated resume and answers to the screening questions below to: ( 
 )

title: Part-time Virtual Assistant - Low Volume Phone Handling (10-20 calls/day)
description:
We are looking for a reliable Virtual Assistant to handle inbound calls for our real estate business. This is a very low-workload position, ideal for someone who can stay online and available during business hours while managing other quiet tasks. You will be the first point of contact for our company, ensuring our clients receive professional service.



Workload & Expectations:



Total call volume is very low, typically between 10 to 20 calls per day.



Most calls are brief, lasting only 1-3 minutes.



Outside of these calls, there is very little active work required.



You must remain online and ready to answer calls via our VoIP system from 9:30 am to 5:30 pm Melbourne time (AEDT/AEST).



Responsibilities:



Answer calls professionally and take detailed messages.



Log caller information (name, property address, and request) into a simple shared spreadsheet.



Notify the team immediately of any urgent repair requests.



Requirements:



Fluent English with a clear, professional voice.



A quiet home office environment (no background noise).



Stable high-speed internet.



High reliability – since the volume is low, your main responsibility is simply being there when the phone rings.

title: Bookkeeper
description:
Introduction 





We are a progressive, growing mid-tier accounting firm located in Brisbane Australia.  

We are looking to hire a bookkeeper in a full-time position in a work from home role. 



 

Experience/Education: 





- 3+ years in a BPO, Australian Accounting Firm or other Work From Home environment 

- Experience in Australian Business Accounting/Bookkeeping/Payroll/ BAS 

- Accounting Degree qualified or certified Bookkeeper 



 

Key Tasks: 





This role will be to service a book of clients for our associated company SRJ Walker Wayland, under the supervision of your Team Leader and your Manager.  Duties of this role will include: 





- Bank and credit card Reconciliations across multiple companies 

- General Ledger Maintenance/Bookkeeping 

- Balance sheet reconciliations 

- Accounts Payable/Receivable management 

- Monthly reconciliations for debtor/creditor accounts 

- Processing up to Trial Balance stage 

- Preparing Business Activity statements 

- Follow-up clients directly for receipts and general queries 

- Assist with reporting 

- Processing payroll 

- Assist with administrative tasks 



 

Software: 





- Xero experience of 2+ years - certified 

- Weel experience 

- MS Office 365 suite and MS Teams 

- Other software experience such as use of Tanda, Account Kit, Approval Max  Aroflo, Deputy, Hubdocs or Dear Inventory is an advantage 



 

Personal attributes: 





- Can work independently and in a team 

- Good written and verbal skills 

- High standard of English proficiency  

- Quick learner 

- Organised 

- Mature attitude and can work under pressure at times 

- Cares about quality outcomes for our business, clients and teamwork 

- Is efficient and effective in their role 

- Focused on continuous improvement  

- Able to meet set deadlines 

- Ability to report to multiple supervisors 

- Due to the role, must be able to maintain confidentiality 



 

About our company: 





Damayan is part of the SRJ Walker Wayland group, a progressive accounting and business advisory firm that has been in business for over 30 years in Australia with offices in Brisbane and the Sunshine Coast. We are a Xero Platinum partner in Australia. 



SRJ Walker Wayland assist small and medium enterprises, corporations, partnerships and individuals with audit & assurance, business advice, tax strategies, self-managed superannuation and external CFO services. 



We believe in continuing professional growth of the skills of our entire team utilising the best software technology such as Xero and Weel to deliver our services efficiently and effectively. Our accounting firm is fully cloud based and has a total staff of approximately 75 tea
mbers.

title: Motion Graphics & Product Animation Video Creator (Ongoing Project)
description:
We are looking for a talented motion graphics and animation video creator to produce short promotional and feature-showcase videos for our platform, BizBaby.



The goal of these videos is to visually demonstrate new features, workflows, and product capabilities in a clean, modern, and engaging way. Some videos may include a short talking-head segment (founder or tea
mber), but the primary focus is animation, motion graphics, and product-style visual storytelling, rather than simple video editing.



What You’ll Be Creating:

- Short feature-showcase videos (30–120 seconds)

- Product-style animations built from Figma designs, UI layouts, and visual concepts

- Motion graphics highlighting buttons, flows, and product interactions

- Clean promotional videos optimized for website, YouTube, and social media

- Occasionally: combining talking-head footage with animated sequences



Some examples of what quality is expected:









Responsibilities:

- Create animations based on provided Figma files, visual assets, and feature outlines

- Design smooth transitions, callouts, and UI motion sequences

- Maintain consistent visual style, pacing, and branding

- Deliver export-ready video files in required formats



Requirements

- Strong experience in motion graphics and animation (After Effects, similar tools)

- Ability to animate UI/product visuals from design files\

- Good visual storytelling sense for promotional product videos

- Reliable communication and ability to work on an ongoing basis





To Apply

Please include:

- 2–5 examples of animation or motion graphics work (product videos preferred but not required)

- Your estimated cost per 60–90 second video

- Typical turnaround time



This is an ongoing collaboration, as new features and promotional videos will be produced regularly.

title: Lead Generation & LinkedIn Outreach Specialist (SaaS – Live Event Venues)
description:
We are a SaaS platform that helps live event venues improve profitability, financial visibility, and operational efficiency.

We are hiring a Lead Generation & LinkedIn Outreach Specialist to identify qualified venue operators, start conversations, and book demos. You are NOT selling. Your job is to qualify and schedule demos only.



This is a long-term role for someone reliable, detail-oriented, and professional.





## Your Responsibilities



You will be responsible for:



* Researching and sourcing qualified leads independently

* Identifying decision-makers (Owners, General Managers, Venue Directors, Operations Directors)

* Finding and verifying LinkedIn profiles

* Sending LinkedIn outreach messages using provided scripts

* Starting professional conversations with prospects

* Qualifying prospects based on provided criteria

* Booking demos when prospects are qualified

* Tracking all outreach and lead activity in Google Sheets



You must be comfortable sourcing your own leads. This is a core part of the role.



## Target Customers



We target independent live event venues with:



* 300–2,000 capacity

* Frequent live events

* Spreadsheet-based financial tracking

* Decision-makers responsible for operations and profitability



You will NOT contact assistants, marketing roles, or non-decision-makers.



## Monthly Performance Expectations



Expected performance per month:



* Source 400–800 qualified leads

* Send 300–500 outreach messages

* Book 8–20 qualified demos



Quality is more important than volume.



We focus on qualified demos, not spam.



## Requirements



Required:



* Strong written English

* Experience with lead generation, research, or outreach

* Experience using LinkedIn

* Strong attention to detail

* Ability to follow instructions carefully

* Reliable and consistent work habits



Preferred:



* SDR or appointment setting experience

* B2B outreach experience

* Lead generation experience



---



## Work Style Requirements



This role requires:



* Manual outreach only (no automation tools)

* Professional and respectful communication

* Strong organization and tracking

* Reliability and consistency



This is a long-term opportunity with growth potential.





## To Apply



Please include:



1. Your experience with lead generation or outreach

2. Your experience using LinkedIn

3. Your hourly rate

4. The word **VENUE** at the top of your application



Applications without the word VENUE will not be considered.

title: Microsoft Service Desk Technician (Level 1–2)
description:
Remote | Australian Business Clients | Full Time (AEST)



We are an Australian IT services firm supporting small and mid?sized businesses. We are looking for an experienced Service Desk Technician with strong English skills to provide remote Level 1–2 IT support to Australian clients.

This is not a call?centre role. You will be expected to troubleshoot issues, communicate clearly with business users, and take ownership of tickets.



Responsibilities

Provide Level 1–2 support for Windows 10/11 users

Support Microsoft 365 including Outlook, Teams, SharePoint and OneDrive

Troubleshoot basic networking issues including VPN, DNS, DHCP and TCP/IP

Deliver professional phone and
 support

Document work accurately, manage tickets, and escalate issues when required

Work with third?party vendors where necessary



Requirements

Excellent spoken and written English (mandatory)

Minimum 2 years’ experience in a service desk or IT support role

Hands?on experience supporting Microsoft 365 in a business environment

Strong Windows 10/11 troubleshooting skills

Confidence providing phone support to business users

Ability to work independently with reliable internet

Nice to have: experience in an MSP environment, backups, or VoIP

Working hours (mandatory)

Full?time, 40 hours per week

Australian business hours: 8:30am – 5:30pm AEST

If you cannot commit to Australian business hours, do not apply.



Compensation

Salary is competitive and based on experience, communication skills, and technical capability. We value quality over cost. Strong performers are considered for salary increases and expanded responsibilities.



How to apply (read carefully)

Applications that do not follow these steps will not be considered.



Subject line

“I want to work with” plus one Microsoft 365 technology



Short introduction

Start your message with 2–3 sentences explaining why you want the role and why you are a good fit.



Resume

Provide your resume or CV. Applications without a resume will not be reviewed.



Video introduction (required)

Record a video no longer than 2 minutes.

English only, camera on, speaking directly to the camera.

Upload the video to Google Drive, OneDrive or similar and include the link.

– Your current role and service desk experience

– Your Microsoft 365 experience

– Why you are interested in this role

Applications without a video will not be accepted.

mbers.

title: Executive Assistant
description:
Attention, Rockstars! We’re looking for a full-time Executive Assistant. This role provides high-level administrative support to the CEO, ensuring the smooth operation of daily activities. This role involves managing schedules, coordinating meetings, handling communications, and performing a wide range of administrative tasks to support executives in their strategic responsibilities. The Executive Assistant acts as a key point of contact and is responsible for maintaining confidentiality, ensuring efficient workflow, and managing critical tasks with professionalism and discretion.



Responsibilities:

Manage the executive’s calendar, scheduling meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements, and ensuring that time is allocated efficiently.

Act as the primary point of contact for internal and external communications, screening calls,
s, and visitors, and directing inquiries as appropriate.

Coordinate meetings, conferences, and events, including preparing agendas, arranging logistics, and ensuring all materials are available.

Prepare and edit correspondence, reports, presentations, and other documents on behalf of the executive.

Handle confidential information with the utmost discretion and ensure sensitive documents are securely maintained.

Assist with special projects, conducting research, gathering data, and preparing reports as required by the executive.

Liaise with other departments and executives to ensure smooth communication and collaboration on cross-functional initiatives.

Anticipate the executive's needs and provide support to ensure they are well-prepared for meetings, presentations, and other engagements.



Qualifications/Requirements:

Proven experience (1-2 years) as an Executive Assistant, Personal Assistant, or in a similar role supporting senior executives.

Exceptional organizational skills with the ability to prioritize tasks, manage multiple responsibilities, and meet deadlines.

Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a professional and polished demeanor.

Strong attention to detail and accuracy in completing tasks.

High level of discretion and confidentiality when handling sensitive information.

Proficiency in GSuite (Doc, Sheet, Slides, Drive) and Zoom Workspace and familiarity with office management tools and software.

Ability to work independently and proactively, with a strong sense of initiative.

Strong interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with executives, staff, and external contacts.



Our Purpose:

To develop and market products that help individuals to grow in multiple facets in life.

To Increase awareness and skill sets for the public we serve.

To make a significant difference in the quality of life of people not reaching their potential and those often left behind.

To produce and develop Millionaire closers.



By applying, you will show that you are committed to being a SUCCESS, and your success is important to us. I believe in supporting our clients and helping associates achieve their financial goals.



The position is Full-Time (remote) between the hours of 8:00AM - 5:00PM Pacific Standard Time, Monday through Friday.
